description: Episode number 10 of Series "War in the Air". A series of films telling of the story of air power and its impact on the world during WWII compiled by the BBC and using extracts from war documentary films and sequences constructed and specially shot by BBC Production Unit with the co-ooperation and advice of the services. This episode covers the air plan for the re-entry into north-west Europe.
